DataElement.preferredName: Unexpected Adverse Event Occurrence Coded Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text code to signify the occurrence of an adverse event associated with a medical product or procedure that has not been previously observed, whether or not the event was anticipated because of the pharmacologic properties of the study agent or the nature of the medical procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any adverse event associated with a medical product or procedure that has not been previously observed, whether or not the event was anticipated because of the pharmacologic properties of the study agent or the nature of the medical procedure. This includes events that are more serious than expected or occur more frequently than expected, particularly, any adverse experience, the nature, severity or frequency of which is not consistent with the product label, or with the current investigator brochure for investigational agent; or with the risk information described in the investigational plan or protocol or consent form._Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any adverse event associated with a medical product or procedure that has not been previously observed, whether or not the event was anticipated because of the pharmacologic properties of the study agent or the nature of the medical procedure. This includes events that are more serious than expected or occur more frequently than expected, particularly, any adverse experience, the nature, severity or frequency of which is not consistent with the product label, or with the current investigator brochure for investigational agent; or with the risk information described in the investigational plan or protocol or consent form.

Concepts.definition: Any adverse event associated with a medical product or procedure that has not been previously observed, whether or not the event was anticipated because of the pharmacologic properties of the study agent or the nature of the medical procedure. This includes events that are more serious than expected or occur more frequently than expected, particularly, any adverse experience, the nature, severity or frequency of which is not consistent with the product label, or with the current investigator brochure for investigational agent; or with the risk information described in the investigational plan or protocol or consent form.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Response of Y (Yes) or N (No) to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for NCI CCR clinical trial
